root.name: energy from beta
root.description: [b]Returns particle kinetic energy as a function of relativistic speed beta[/b]

element.label: beta min
element.description: Speed of particle as fraction of speed of light: beta = v/c , minimum value for data series.

element.label: beta max
element.description: Speed of particle as fraction of speed of light: beta = v/c , maximum value for data series.

element.label: number of points
element.description: Number of points in each data serie

element.label: X axis spacing
element.description: X axis spacing. Linear means that datapoints will be equally distributed on linear scale, while logarithmic means that datapoints will be equally distributed on logarithmic scale
